doc:
Sidney Slon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sidney_Slon 0 Sidney Slon (May 27, 1910 in Chicago – January 21, 1995) was an American radio and television writer and actor. In his lifetime, Slon had contributed to radio and television greatly, being the head writer of the famous radio show, The Shadow, as well as the radio show, Dick Tracy. He acted in the radio show, "The Goldberg's", and played the doctor. He also produced many television series that became great hits in the 1950s and 60s. Sidney_Slon ( May_27_,_1910 in Chicago – January_21_,_1995 ) was an_American_radio_and_television_writer_and_actor . In his_lifetime , Slon had_contributed to radio_and_television greatly , being the_head_writer of the_famous_radio_show , The_Shadow , as_well_as the_radio_show , Dick_Tracy . He acted in the_radio_show , " The_Goldberg 's_" , and played the_doctor . He also produced many_television_series that became great_hits in the_1950s_and_60s .
